options.Click: open the Print Dialogue Box, if there is a graph loaded

options.To Unweighted SIF: export an unweighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded, if there is a graph loaded
options.To Weighted SIF: export an weighted SIF file from the graph currently loaded, if there is a graph loaded
options.To Unweighted GraphML: export an unweighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded, if there is a graph loaded
options.To Weighted GraphML: export an weighted GraphML file from the graph currently loaded, if there is a graph loaded

options.Click: center, zoom to 100%, and reapply the force graph parameters, if there is a graph loaded

options.Show With Mouse Over: display when user mouses over an edge.

options.Detected: be automatically detected and set to small, medium, or large, based on the browser window.
options.Small: be set to small, unless this was the size automatically detected.
options.Medium: be set to medium, unless this was the size automatically detected.
options.Large: be set to large, unless this was the size automatically detected.

options.Unchecked: be allowed to be past the viewport

options.Click: undo the effects of the reset, if the Undo Reset button is enabled.
revert to its original configuration, if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked.

title: Sliders

options.Keep at Default Values: should configure according to its default values
options.Link Distance Increase: edges should visibly decrease in length if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Link Distance Decrease: edges should visibly increase in length if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Charge Increase: nodes should visibly increase attraction with each other if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Charge Decrease: nodes should visibly decrease attraction with each other if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Charge Distance Increase: nodes should visibly increase charge distance if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Charge Distance Decrease: nodes should visibly decrease charge distance if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Gravity Increase: response to gravity should visibly increase if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and
options.Gravity Decrease: response to gravity should visibly decrease if Lock Force Graph Parameters is unchecked and

conditional: if there is a graph loaded.

options.None: have no graph in the viewport
options.File Tab - Open Excel Workbook: generate a network graph from the Excel workbook given no warnings or errors are generated.
options.File Tab - Import SIF: generate a network graph from the SIF file given no warnings or errors are generated.
options.File Tab - Import GraphML: generate a network graph from the SIF file given no warnings or errors are generated.
